biotools.summary:
This is a set of programs based on htslib to benchmark variant calls against gold standard truth datasets.

To compare a VCF against a gold standard dataset, use the following commmand line to perform genotype-level haplotype comparison.

galaxy.summary: A tool to perform comparisons only based on chromosome, position, and allele identity for comparison of somatic callsets.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: This is a set of programs based on htslib to benchmark variant calls against gold standard truth datasets.To compare a VCF against a gold standard dataset, use the following commmand line to perform genotype-level haplotype comparison.
